entry.string: cd epi-workspace/docker/k8s/templates && sed 's/%domain%/epiqa/g' deployment.yaml.template | sed 's/%subdomain%/nvs.epiqa/g' | sed 's/%vaultdomain%/nvs/g' | sed 's|%POD_DOCKER_REPOSITORY%|public.ecr.aws/n4q1q0z2/epi|g' | sed 's|%ORGANISATION__DEPLOYMENT_PREFIX%|pharmaledger|g' | sed 's|%usecase_version%|aa85300c4256d639cf60777b4eab2391812e0988|g' > deployment.yaml
